body_html: We have the same problem, upgrade from pytorch 0.1.12 to 0.2.0_1. The test program indeed works on 0.2.0_1. I am suspecting some problem with cuda and cudnn coupled with the fact that we create multiple agents in different subprocesses.

body: We have the same problem, upgrade from pytorch 0.1.12 to 0.2.0_1. The test program indeed works on 0.2.0_1. I am suspecting some problem with cuda and cudnn coupled with the fact that we create multiple agents in different subprocesses.
